sentences.en: A man of moral integrity does not fear any slanderous attack.
A man of moral integrity never resorts to deception.
He inspires affection and respect as a man of unquestionable integrity.
sentences.cn: 他无可争议的忠诚正直赢得了人们的爱戴和尊敬。

sentences.en: He is a man of the highest integrity.
His comments cast a slur on the integrity of his employees.
sentences.cn: 他的评论是对其雇员正直品质的诋毁.
他的正直是无可争议的。

sentences.en: I have always regarded him as a man of integrity.
sentences.cn: 我一直把他当作一个正直诚实的人。

sentences.en: Roman walls may still be seen but not in their integrity.
sentences.cn: 古罗马城墙尚可见到,但已不完整.

sentences.en: She questioned his integrity as a councillor.
sentences.cn: 她质疑他作为市议员的诚信度.

sentences.en: The ancient pagoda is still there, but not in its integrity.
sentences.cn: 那座古塔还在, 但是不完整了.

sentences.en: The buyer was convinced of the salesman's integrity.
sentences.cn: 买主深信销售员的诚实.

sentences.en: the territorial integrity of the country
This is yet another slur on the integrity of the Metropolitan Police.
sentences.cn: 这是对伦敦市警察局刚正廉明作风的又一次诽谤。

sentences.en: We all have an interest in maintaining the integrity of the ecosystem.
sentences.cn: 维持生态系统的完整是我们共同的利益.

sentences.en: We must respect each other's territorial integrity.
sentences.cn: 我们应当尊重彼此的领土完整.

sentences.en: We've always regarded him as a man of integrity and high professional competence.
sentences.cn: 我们一直都认为他是个正直而且业务能力很强的人。

words.tran_cn: 综合的；完整的；互相协调的
[数] 整数；整体；完整的事物
整合；使…成整体（integrate的过去分词）
求积分；取消隔离；成为一体
使…完整；使…成整体；求…的积分；表示…的总和

phrases.tran_cn: 参照完整性；引用完整性

trans.tran_cn: 正直，诚实，完整，[计算机]保存，健全
trans.tran_en: the state of being united as one complete thing
